text: Survivor Series (1994) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on November 23, 1994 at Freeman Coliseum in San Antonio, Texas. It was the eighth Survivor Series event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Bob Holly defeated Kwang (with Harvey Wippleman) Singles match N/A 2 The Bad Guys (Razor Ramon, The 1-2-3 Kid, The British Bulldog, Fatu and Sione) (with Afa and Captain Lou Albano) defeated The Teamsters (Shawn Michaels, Diesel, Owen Hart, Jim Neidhart and Jeff Jarrett) Five-on-five Survivor Series Elimination match 21:45 3 The Royal Family (Jerry Lawler, Sleazy, Queasy and Cheesy) defeated Clowns Are Us (Doink the Clown, Dink, Pink and Wink) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 16:05 4 Bob Backlund (with Owen Hart) defeated Bret Hart (c) (with The British Bulldog) Submission match for the WWF Championship 35:11 5 The Million Dollar Team (King Kong Bundy, Tatanka, Bam Bam Bigelow, Jimmy Del Ray and Tom Prichard) (with Ted DiBiase) defeated Guts and Glory (Lex Luger, Mabel, Adam Bomb, Billy Gunn and Bart Gunn) (with Oscar) Five-on- five Survivor Series elimination match 23:21 6 The Undertaker (with Paul Bearer) defeated Yokozuna (with Mr. Fuji and Jim Cornette) Casket match with Chuck Norris as the Special Guest Enforcer 27:24 === Survivor Series elimination matches === Eliminated Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time Fatu Diesel Pinfall 13:31 The 1-2-3 Kid 14:13 Sione 14:44 The British Bulldog N/A Countout 15:58 Diesel 21:45 Jeff Jarrett Jim Neidhart Owen Hart Shawn Michaels Razor Ramon (The Bad Guys) Eliminated Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time Doink Jerry Lawler Pinfall 10:36 Wink Cheesy 13:10 Pink 14:28 Dink Sleazy 16:05 Cheesy, Jerry Lawler, Sleazy and Queasy (clean sweep) Eliminated Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time Tom Prichard Mabel Pinfall 3:58 Mabel N/A Countout 7:15 Adam Bomb Bam Bam Bigelow Pinfall 8:09 Jimmy Del Ray Lex Luger 9:56 Bart Gunn Tatanka 13:27 Billy Gunn King Kong Bundy 16:14 Tatanka Lex Luger 23:14 Lex Luger King Kong Bundy 23:21 Bam Bam Bigelow and King Kong Bundy (The Million Dollar Team) ==References== ==Other websites==
